span.h2: Governor Tim Walz announced today that schools will remain closed throughout the 2019-2020 school year. Distance learning will continue. St. Cloud Area School District will also continue to provide meals for our students and childcare for essential emergency workers. The "stay at home" order for all Minnesotans remains in effect through May 4.

a.title: Go to comments for St. Cloud Area Schools Closed Effective March 16
